snippet.title: Classic Game Room - BERZERK review for Atari 2600
snippet.description:
Berzerk Atari 2600 review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Shop CGR shirts & hats! http://www.CGRstore.com
Classic Game Room reviews BERZERK for Atari 2600 from 1982, an amazing Atari version of the 1980 Stern arcade game, Berzerk!! Defeat Evil Otto and his minions in never-ending electrocution death mazes on the planet Mazeon!! The classic Atari 2600 version of Berzerk is an excellent recreation of the arcade machine with faithful gameplay and good sounds and visuals. Berzerk may look like a simple game, but prepare to get destroyed by waves of killer robots and the unstoppable Evil Otto!!
